document_data.name: Jurisk Ulhammond
document_data.mainbody: '''Jurisk Ulhammond''' was a moneylender of [[Waterdeep]], as well as the leader of the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] cell of the [[Red Sashes]].
document_data.Description: Jurisk was one of only two members of the Sashes, along with [[Naneatha Lharilstar]], that knew the true identity of their secretive leader, known only as [[Durnan|"The One"]].
document_data.Death: After running into a [[doppelganger|greater doppelganger]] called [[Ptola]], who was a member of the [[Unseen]], Jurisk fell and his identity was stolen by the shapeshifter. [[Hlaavin]], the leader of the Unseen, was undecided about what to do with their new-found position.
